mapper.select: SELECT i.num, i.order_code, i.product_code, p.name as 'product_name', i.quantity, i.price, pri.price as 'old_price', (i.quantity * i.price) as 'total_price', o.buyer_code, b.name as 'buyer_name', pri.start_date, pri.end_date, i.delyn, i.adduser, i.adddate, i.upduser, i.upddate FROM order_item i LEFT JOIN order_header o ON o.order_code = i.order_code LEFT JOIN buyer b ON b.buyer_code = o.buyer_code LEFT JOIN product p ON p.product_code = i.product_code LEFT JOIN price pri ON pri.product_code = i.product_code and pri.buyer_code = o.buyer_code AND pri.delyn = 'N' WHERE p.delyn = 'N' AND i.order_code = #{orderCode} AND pri.start_date <= #{requestDate} AND pri.end_date >= #{requestDate}

SELECT o.order_code, o.buyer_code, b.name as buyer_name, o.order_date, o.request_date, o.approval_date, o.return_date, o.status, o.memo, o.comment, o.adduser, o.adddate, IFNULL(o.upduser,'-'), IFNULL(o.upddate,'-') FROM order_header o LEFT JOIN buyer b ON o.buyer_code = b.buyer_code WHERE o.delyn = 'N' AND o.order_code = #{order_code}
mapper.update: UPDATE order_header SET status = #{status}, request_date = #{request_date}, memo = #{memo}, upduser = #{upduser}, upddate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE order_code = #{order_code}
